element.name: Dire Wolf
element.source: Axel's Homebrew Collected from Many Places

description.p: The dire wolf mount has the stats of a dire wolf from the Monster Manual.

element.name: Living Wagon
element.source: Axel's Homebrew Collected from Many Places

description.p: The living wagon is 3 times as long and 1.5 times as wide as a regular cart. It is robust enough where it can be furnished with light beds, bookcases, etc. Because of its weight, it needs at least 4 horses to pull it.
